name: Mario Paraschiv
subtext: A self-taught Full-Stack Developer specializing in TypeScript.

information: Hi! I'm Mario, a self-taught Full-Stack Developer based in London, specialising in TypeScript, Go, Next.js, React.js, and SSR / SPA / SaaS applications.
I spend my free time tinkering with existing software to extend its functionality, along with learning how tools and frameworks work internally to better optimise my work.
values: Providing transparency, excellence, integrity, and solving my client's problems is my top priority.
I hold myself and my work to the highest standards. When you work with me, you can expect exceptional quality in every aspect â€” the little details paint the bigger picture.
work: Feel free to reach out if you are interested in working with me. I would be happy to explore any opportunity that aligns with my values.
Whether you have a project in mind, would like something done the right way, wish to discuss potential collaborations, or simply want to connect, please do not hesitate to get in contact.

projects.name: Kiwa
overview: Kiwa is an Asian fusion restaurant based in Aix-en-Provence, France.
Built with React.js and the popular UI library @shadcn/ui, the website features a monochrome colour scheme to draw visitors' attention to the restaurant's catering services.
responsibilities: I was the sole developer of this project.
I was responsible for every aspect of the website, including but not limited to: design, functionality, performance, layout, and accessibility.

The website makes use of a proprietary internationalisation implementation. It also uses the new Chrome View Transitions API, allowing seamless transitions such as switching between dark and light modes.

projects.name: Unbound
overview: Unbound is an open-source modification designed to add functionality to the Discord mobile app with unprecedented levels of customization. Offering a rich array of features from plug-ins to themes, fonts, and icon packs, Unbound redefines the user experience, providing a platform for personalization unlike any other.
